title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When making changes to the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, inefficient redraws occur.
OB: During text changes with word wrap enabled, the StyledText control experiences inefficient redraws.
EB: The StyledText control should not experience inefficient redraws during text changes with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText control.
2. Make changes to the text in the StyledText control.
3. Observe the inefficient redraws that occur.
In addition, add the following line to the performPaint method in StyledText to see the redraws occurring:
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
